title: Tonight You Belong To Me
lyrics:
[intro]
| (G) (G) (G) (G) (Gsus4) (G) (G) | (G) (G) (G) (G) (Gsus4) (G) |  x2
 
I (G)know (I know) you  be(G7)loooooong
To (C)sooooomebody (Cm)neeeeeew
But to(G)night, you be(D)long to (G)me
 
[interlude]
| (G) (G) (G) (G) (Gsus4) (G) (G) | (G) (G) (G) (G) (Gsus4) (G) |  x2
 
Al(G)though (although) we're a(G7)paaaaaart
You're a (C)paaaaart of my (Cm)heaaaaart
But to(G)night, you be(D)long to (G)me (G7)
 
Way (Cm)down by the stream
How (Cm)sweet it will seem
Once (G)more just to (E7)dream
in the (A7)moonlight (D7)
 
My honey I (G)know (I know) with the (G7)daaaaaawn
That (C)you will be (Cm)goooooone
But to(G)night, you be(D)long to (G)me
Just (D7)little old (G)me (G) (G) (G) (Gsus4) (G)
(G-single strum) [end]
